resources.string: The new round will have the same members and contributors as the previous one.
Lichess detects round completion based on the source games. Use this toggle if there is no source.
Optional long description of the broadcast. %1$s is available. Length must be less than %2$s characters.

string.name: sourceSingleUrl
string.comment: An input box. The user can add the external URL the PGN playback of the game is coming from, to set up their event broadcast.

resources.string: URL that Lichess will check to get PGN updates. It must be publicly accessible from the Internet.
Up to 64 Lichess game IDs, separated by spaces.
Start date in your own timezone
Optional, if you know when the event starts
Definitively delete the round and its games.
Delete all games of this round. The source will need to be active in order to re-create them.
Definitively delete the entire tournament, all its rounds and all its games.
Compute and display a simple leaderboard based on game results
Optional: replace player names, ratings and titles
Optional, how long to wait between requests. Min 2s, max 60s. Defaults to automatic based on the number of viewers.
